variantName: Amazon Pay ICICI Bank Credit Card

benefits.description: Unlimited, non-expiring cashback credited directly to Amazon Pay balance (1 cashback = ₹1).
Higher cashback on Amazon.in purchases for Prime members.
Cashback on 100+ Amazon Pay partner merchants when using Login and Pay with Amazon.
Lower foreign currency markup compared to most entry-level cards.

declaredConstraints.description: No cashback is earned on fuel, EMI transactions, rent, education payments, or gold purchases.
Amazon Prime membership status determines applicable cashback tier on Amazon spends.

declaredEligibility.description: Indian citizen aged between 21 and 60 years.
Salaried applicants require a minimum monthly income of ₹20,000.
Self-employed applicants require a minimum monthly income of ₹30,000.
Card is generally offered to existing Amazon India customers via invite-only or pre-approved flow.

declaredWelcomeBenefits.description: No joining bonus. Card is lifetime free with ongoing cashback benefits.

milestones.declaredReward: No spend-based milestones. Cashback is uncapped and earned per transaction.
